text:
Created attachment 31546
Java Class and Excel file to run the bug.

On some of my Excel files, POI throws a NulPointerException on HSSFCell.getCellComment() method.

I have made a synthetic Excel file and a sunthetic Java class, which are in the attachment, to present this bug.
creator: lionel.joye@renault.com

text: Have you checked that the cell isn't null? Row.getCell(int) can return null if the cell has never been used or styled - use the overloaded getting with a MissingCellPolicy or check for null if you want your code to cope easily with this
creator: apache@gagravarr.org

text:
Ok, I'm sorry : you're right, I didn't think the cell before the last cell could be null.

Thank you :-).

Lionel
creator: lionel.joye@renault.com
